dict.acceptation: 程序，手续；工序，过程，步骤；诉讼程序，（议会的）议事程序；〈罕〉进行；

sent.orig: In computer programming, synonym for procedure.
sent.trans: 在计算机程序设计中同procedure（过程）。

sent.orig: Scotland has two types of criminal procedure, know as solemn procedure and summary procedure.
sent.trans: 英格兰有两种刑事诉讼：庄重诉讼和即决诉讼。

sent.orig: The legal procedure is the integration of law and procedure, herein procedure is subject to law.
sent.trans: 法律程序为法律与程序之连接，程序于此附从于法律。

sent.orig: The function of the pretrial procedure lies in procedure justice guarantee and procedure benefit enhancing mainly.
sent.trans: 审前程序的功能主要在于保障程序公正和提高程序效益。

sent.orig: To monitor all related people to follow operation instructions, safety operation procedure and anti-mixing procedure.
sent.trans: 监管相关人员按照作业指导书，安全操作规程，防混料程序进行操作。
